name: Boucle Pouffe with Walnut Plinth
description: A truly versatile piece, the Bouclé Pouffe features an ash-veneered plinth which is hand-stained walnut and upholstered in an off-white bouclé fabric. With its compact shape, the pouffe makes ideal extra seating for unexpected guests, a soft footrest or a side table for drinks trays. Made in the UK. The Bouclé Pouffe with Walnut Plinth is the ideal accessory for those looking to add a touch of bouclé texture into their design. Described by Stylist Magazine as 'the perfect addition to any cosy corner'.
